attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Where do we start?

I think the first place to start is the war in Iraq.

I do agree with the war against Terrorism but the way we are handling this is totally wrong. Our Governments are teaching the innocent Iraqi’s to fight against the Taliban themselves.

By this they are helping them to create their own army. Do they think the Taliban are stupid! The Taliban are waiting for that army to be created. Once they have a Professional army the Taliban will lie low for a while, they will then place one of there own men into the politics of the country. Once that person has the enough power he will take over the army (Trained by both the Americans and the English) to invade more countries.

What a waste of Beautiful Countries which could make lots of money by tourism and manufacturing,

Coming soon

Then Benefits of the Scroungers in the UK

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
